SEARCH
Package pages.user

Class BookingPages

java.lang.Object
pages.user.BookingPages
public class BookingPages extends Object
The AdminPages class holds the functionality connected with the booking pages.

  • Constructor Details

    • BookingPages

      public BookingPages()

  • Method Details

    • bookingPage

      public static void bookingPage()
      The bookingPage method represents the actions users can take when booking a movie. Users can make a booking through searching by 3 different choices, movie, cinema and genre. If the choice is invalid, users will be re-directed to UserPages.

    • searchByCineplexPage

      public static void searchByCineplexPage()
      The searchByCineplexPage method allows user to make a booking through searching of available cineplexes. If the user inputs are invalid, the corresponding exception messages will be displayed. If they are valid, users will be able to make a booking.

    • searchByMoviePage

      public static void searchByMoviePage(ArrayList<Movie> movies)
      The searchByMoviePage method allows user to make a booking through searching of available movies. If the user inputs are invalid, the corresponding exception messages will be displayed. If they are valid, users will be able to make a booking.

    • searchByGenrePage

      public static void searchByGenrePage()
      The searchByGenrePage method allows user to make a booking through searching of available genres. If the user inputs are invalid, the corresponding exception messages will be displayed. If they are valid, users will be able to make a booking.

    • makeBooking

      public static void makeBooking(ShowTime showTime, Cineplex cineplex, LocalDate date)
      The makeBooking method allows user to make a booking after selecting the movie, cineplex and timeslot. If the user inputs are invalid, the corresponding exception messages will be displayed. If they are valid, users will be able to make a booking. The function will also check if the user is old enough to watch certain movies due to the movies' ratings, based on their date of birth which is entered when creating an user account. The user will be able to select their seats in this method, as long as the seats are not occupied. After a successful booking, a "successful booking" message will be displayed as acknowledgement.

    • printSeatOccupation

      public static void printSeatOccupation(ShowTime showTime)
      The printSeatOccupation method displays the seats in the cinema. Users will be able to see the type of seats (normal, deluxe, couple) and the occupation status of the seats.

    • getPrice

      public static double getPrice(ShowTime showTime, LocalDate date, User user, Seat seat)
      The getPrice method displays the ticket prices based on the day, time, type of seats as well as type of movie. This method will compute the price and display ticket prices when users are making a booking.

    • isHoliday

      public static Holiday isHoliday(LocalDate date)
      The isHoliday method checks if a day is a holiday or not. If it is, the name of the holiday will be returned. Else, it will return NULL.

    • paymentIfValid

      public static boolean paymentIfValid()
      The ifPaymentValid method is to input the payment details and check if they are valid. If any of the payment details is invalid it will show a console massage that it is not in the wanted format.
      Returns:
      true if all details are valid. false if there is any invalid.
